name: Pyrrhus
description:
To find your lost son you will have to make sacrifices. But at what cost ? 

Hey everyone ! 

First participation for some of us and it was fun. We are a small group, a sound designer, a programmer and a game designer, working together and for the first time on Unity. 

We choose the easy way with the graphics because none of us are very good at drawing. So we Opt-outs in Graphics. 

The Game:

You can get power, bonus and weapon but you will sacrifice your speed, your jump, you hit points or your vision. 

There is 4 power up you can get. 

  •  Speed but you have to sacrifice some of your jump height. 
  •  Vision but you have to sacrifice the colors and the light (in game).
  • Melee Attack but you have to sacrifice Hitpoints.
  • Ranged Attack but you have to sacrifice some of your speed.

Controls:

WASD to Move 
Space to Jump
Mouse Button 1 & 2 to Attack
